document.full_text: a national conservation group on tuesday declared the 444-mile susquehanna river in new york, pennsylvania and maryland to be the nation's most endangered due to use of a gas drilling method known as hydraulic fracturing in the region.
document.title: susquehanna tops list of nation's most endangered rivers
lines_and_colors: a national conservation group on tuesday declared the 444-mile susquehanna river in new york, pennsylvania and maryland to be the nation's most endangered due to use of a gas drilling method known as hydraulic fracturing in the region.
